## Source: amazon-inspector (878a9c43dd8ff489c2771eb72e59389391267772d0e64b6dea94a657d0ca7b3a)
The package search-savedsearch-podlet was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d59a7c90a65781e9c3327c35f8ecc0d3f485bcb62487686d7ba215e7db2eabda)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'search-savedsearch-podlet' @ 5.4.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
